quote: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Do not save what is left after spending; instead spend what is left after saving.
author: Warrent Buffett

quote: I can understand wanting to have millions of dollars, there’s a certain freedom, meaningful freedom that comes with that. But once you get much beyond that, I have to tell you, it’s the same hamburger.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Use goals to make saving meaningful
